thought: To craft orange stained glass I first need to craft red dye, which can be crafted using a poppy. I have one poppy in my inventory at slot 30, so I will move it to slot 1 to begin crafting.
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 1 with quantity 1
